title: The coexistence of electrocaloric and magnetocaloric effects in Pb(Fe1/2Nb1/2)O3 ceramics

author: Uroš Prah, Electronics Ceramics Department, Jožef Stefan Institute

segmentation: OK, I'll represent the with the title, coexistence of electric and magnetic Logic effect inlet irons now, bait ceramics.

Nowadays, most of the cooling devices are based on a vapor compression filtration system that uses liquid and circulating liquid and gases medium which are salt and remove heat from the sample or the system that we want to cool.
But in most cases these refrigerants are environmentally hazardous and can leads to the depletion of the ozone layer.
On the other hand, in solid state cooling technologies, no environmentally hazardous refrigerants are needed because in their technology also less moving parts are involved.
This mean that.
Also, less noise and vibration are produced during their operation and because of their smaller size they are most suitable for a smaller cooling devices.
For example of cooling a small electronic components.

One of the promising solid state cooling curve technologies are based on electric and magnetic effect, which is defined as the adiabatic and reversible temperature change of the material under the influence of external stimuli.
As you can see from the first picture, is electrokinetic effect.
Here we have electric field, which align those electric depots in the materials which decrease the entropy of the system and its adiabatic condition.
This means that interviewed over system remains constant.
That's that's constantly.
Heated heated up the December for the same temperature change and the reverse process.
When the electric field is removed from the sample, that's increased the entropy of the system and consequently cools down the sample.
For the electric logic temperature change.
In the case of magnetic effect is the analog to electric effect with only difference.

Here we have a magnetic depots in the material and magnetic field which reorient this magnetic depots in the materials and consequently cools down the sample for the magnetocaloric temperature change.
But in Basra, materials are currently not showing sufficiently large electric logic or monitor caloric temperature change and.

For one possible option, one possible solution to enhance this effect in this material is to prepare material where both literally and monitor caloric effect coexisted in the same material and that's why in our work we prepared to let iron Nuggets ceramic materials, which is one of the first known solid state cooling multi caloric materials there both electric and magnetic effect coexisted in the same material, so that means that here we have elected depots and magnetic depots which can be.
Reorder, reorder, entered, but application of both left and magnetic field and for the further explanation you are.
You're welcome to join me later in front of my.
Poster and I will explain you something more into the details, so thank you.
